Claude changes

Enhance Firebase App Check integration, improve FSK validation, and refactor privacy and UI logic
- Add firebase-app-check-key meta tag to all HTML files; remove hardcoded fallback keys from JS configs - Update firebase-init.js and firebase-config.js to require App Check key via meta/env, improve error handling and logging - Refactor FSK validation in difficulty-selection.js for stricter server-side checks and better error feedback - Improve multiplayer-category-selection.js player readiness logic and player key handling - Refactor multiplayer-difficulty-selection.js for cleaner event listener management and dependency checks - Enhance join-game.js with robust Firebase readiness checks and improved FSK badge rendering - Update firebase-auth.js for safer initialization, promise handling, and redirect logic - Refactor privacy.js: use NocapCookies for consent, improve modal cleanup, TOC insertion, and section toggling - Improve 404.js and difficulty-selection.js for accessibility, reduced motion, and error handling - Add getPlayerKey utility, update event listener cleanup, and minor UI/UX improvements across modules

Improve Firebase initialization handling for difficulty selection and update Cloud Function region in multiplayer lobby
- Add explicit wait for Firebase initialization before proceeding with difficulty selection logic to ensure server-side validation reliability - Refactor dependency loading and error handling in difficulty-selection.js for robustness - Update multiplayer-lobby.js to call Cloud Function in specified region ('europe-west1') for secure game creation - Remove redundant legacy code from multiplayer lobby game creation flow

Refactor age verification and FSK access to use settings-only local cache; remove server-side checks and update UI flows
- Remove server-side and Firebase-based age verification and FSK checks; rely on localStorage/NocapUtils cache for age and premium status - Update all FSK and alcohol mode checks in gameplay, setup, category, and difficulty selection to use local cache - Replace age verification modal on index.html with minimal modals in category-selection.html for age and settings - Adjust GameState, settings.js, and utils.js to treat local cache as source of truth for age/premium - Improve UI feedback and locking for age-restricted categories; ensure proper re-check after age verification - Update multiplayer and singleplayer flows to enforce age verification and FSK gating via settings-only logic - Enhance error handling and fallback logic for missing or invalid age data

Improve age verification handling, modal accessibility, and Cloud Function exports
- Refactor age verification in join-game.js to support legacy and object formats, ensure timestamp creation for legacy entries, and unify expiry logic - Update multiplayer-difficulty-selection.js to improve age level parsing and debug logging for settings-based age checks - Enhance accessibility and state management for difficulty selection: switch from aria-pressed to aria-checked and toggle enabled class on continue button - Refine settings and FSK modal logic for consistent visibility, ARIA attributes, and modal-open body state - Change Cloud Function exports in index.js to lazy-load handlers, preventing deploy timeouts and improving cold start performance
Improve offline support and UI responsiveness in difficulty selection; enhance local age checks and accessibility
Harden local storage handling and prototype pollution checks; improve Firebase initialization in gameplay
Improve age verification UX: auto-resume category selection, enhance multiplayer FSK handling, and persist verification state
Fix text truncation in difficulty cards; improve word wrapping and layout stability
Fix multiplayer lobby race conditions: normalize state early, improve deviceMode handling, and stabilize presence setup
Fix multiplayer join/lobby desync: persist and recover gameId across storage and URL, improve state redundancy and fallback handling

Refactor category and difficulty selection UI for improved mobile layout and Firebase rules for multiplayer rounds
- Redesign category selection: remove example questions from HTML, update question count display, and enhance .question-count styling for locked states - Improve difficulty selection responsiveness: adjust paddings, safe-area handling, and card layouts for mobile devices; refine back button and hover states - Update Firebase RTDB rules: add support for per-round questions, answers, timers, and summaries; clarify write permissions for host and players; extend validation for new fields - Enhance category-selection.js: load question counts per category for stability, add descriptions to categoryData, and improve fallback handling - Set viewport-fit=cover in difficulty-selection.html for better mobile safe-area support
Fix multiplayer role recovery and host/guest state: ensure playerId from Firebase Auth, persist role on every update, and improve robustness after reloads
